Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.api.index

Interface IndexingProvidersService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IndexConfigCompleter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IndexingService
    public interface IndexingProvidersService
extends IndexConfigCompleter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      IndexProviderDescriptor getDefaultProvider()
      There's always a default IndexProvider, this method returns it.
      IndexProviderDescriptor getFulltextProvider()
      The preferred IndexProvider for handling full-text indexes.
      IndexProviderDescriptor indexProviderByName​(String providerName)
      Get the index provider descriptor for the index provider with the given name, or the descriptor of the default index provider, if no name was given.
      void validateBeforeCommit​(IndexDescriptor index, Value[] tuple, long entityId)
      Validate that the given value tuple can be stored in the index associated with the given schema.
      void validateIndexPrototype​(IndexPrototype prototype)
      Validate the given index prototype, or throw an IllegalArgumentException.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.neo4j.internal.schema.IndexConfigCompleter

        completeConfiguration

    • Method Detail

      • indexProviderByName

        IndexProviderDescriptor indexProviderByName​(String providerName)
        Get the index provider descriptor for the index provider with the given name, or the descriptor of the default index provider, if no name was given.
        Parameters:
        providerName - name of the wanted index provider

      • validateBeforeCommit

        void validateBeforeCommit​(IndexDescriptor index,
                          Value[] tuple,
                          long entityId)
        Validate that the given value tuple can be stored in the index associated with the given schema.
        Parameters:
        index - the target index
        tuple - value tuple to validate
        entityId - the id of the entity being validated

      • validateIndexPrototype

        void validateIndexPrototype​(IndexPrototype prototype)
        Validate the given index prototype, or throw an IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        prototype - The prototype to the validated.

      • getDefaultProvider

        IndexProviderDescriptor getDefaultProvider()
        There's always a default IndexProvider, this method returns it.
        Returns:
        the default index provider for this instance.

      • getFulltextProvider

        IndexProviderDescriptor getFulltextProvider()
        The preferred IndexProvider for handling full-text indexes.
        Returns:
        the default or preferred index provider for full-text indexes.
